```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(car)
library(nlme)
library(multcomp)
library(readxl)
```

# Question 1
```{r}
individual = rep(c(1:8), 2)
pizzaType = as.factor(rep(c("Pop John's", "Dominos"), each = 4))
timeOfDay = as.factor(rep(c("After Breakfast", "After Dinner"), each = 8))
mood = c(52, 59, 66, 43, 55, 61, 62, 39,
         77, 69, 68, 71, 82, 69, 80, 59)
pizzaData = data.frame(individual, pizzaType, timeOfDay, mood)

pizzaANOVA = lme(mood ~ timing + pizzaType + timing * pizzaType,
                 random = ~1+timing|individual, data = pizzaData)
anova(pizzaANOVA)
```

# Question 2
```{r}
exercise = rep(c("No Exercise", "20 Min Exercise", "60 Min Exercise"), each = 5)
score = c(23,26,32,37,29,22,27,39,35,46,59,66,38,49,56)
exerciseData = data.frame(exercise, score)

kruskal.test(score ~ exercise, data = exerciseData)
pairwise.wilcox.test(score, exercise, p.adj = "none")
```
